name: subscribe-cov-property-multiple-error
description: Represents a BACnet SubscribeCOVPropertyMultiple error, indicating the type of error and the first failed subscription.

options.name: error-type
options.description: The type of error that occurred.

options.name: first-failed-subscription

fields.name: monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object for the failed subscription.

fields.name: monitored-property-reference
fields.description: The property reference for the failed subscription.

fields.name: error-type
fields.description: The error type for the failed subscription.

options.description: Details of the first failed subscription, including object, property, and error type.
